Project Light London

Shot Blasting Preparation SA2.5
Intumescent Coatings
120 minutes Fire Resistance

Contract Value
£240,000

CABS Industrial were called in on a high value apartment block
in London called project light, we were tasked with 4000m2 of
structural steel and mezzanine corrugated steel ooring, to
blast to SA2.5 standards then prime and top coat in re
retardant intumescent paint for a 120-minute burn rating.

Our project management department and highly skilled re
protection technicians, worked hard for three months with site to
meet and exceed expectations to deliver the project on time and
without any delays, as a result of this excellent works we are now
the company of choice for one of London’s most recognized
contractors Ardmore construction.
